data.title: Oracle Financial Services Lending and Leasing Cloud Service
data.meta_description: Oracle Financial Services Lending and Leasing Cloud Service offers comprehensive asset finance solutions for loan, lease, and line of credit products.
data.text:
Complete asset finance solution

Bring together all stakeholders and manage the complete finance lifecycle—from originations to collections and asset management—on a single platform.

360-degree relationship view

Elevate customer experience, optimize pricing, and reduce risk with a comprehensive relationship view across all financial products.

API-ready

Integrate and engage with the broader finance ecosystem with prebuilt API interfaces to credit bureaus, valuation guides, credit card payment companies, and more.

Multilingual, multicurrency, and multijurisdictional

Maintain contracts in different currencies in a single portfolio by defining transactional currencies and exchange rates. Support diverse and complex accounting regulations with robust and flexible accounting options.

Embedded finance support

Enable simple and seamless integrations with third-party applications, including those for payments, with extensive API capabilities that are essential to delivering an embedded finance experience.

Subscription enablement

Adapt finance programs to subscription-based offerings—including buy now, pay later and usage-based programs—with flexible workflows, advanced behavioral scoring, and Internet of Things (IoT) connectivity.

Securitization support

Enable the ability to create, manage, and track securitization pools alongside customer finance agreement management—essential capabilities for supporting device securitization in the telecommunications sector.

Multicloud options

Support new business models and growth with multiple options to deploy in the cloud—including managed cloud services, SaaS cloud services, and hosting in the cloud

One platform to manage

Reduce the cost and burden of IT management with a single platform to manage the complete asset finance lifecycle.

Self-service and multichannel

Boost efficiency and customer relationships with extensive self-service capabilities via multiple channels to support basic updates and more complex functions, such as changing repayment schedules.
